description:
PyCon Hong Kong 2017 Talk

HA capability with Document Store using MySQL Shell - running Python - by Ivan Ma

With MySQL Shell (mysqlsh), you can script in python to work with MySQL. Creating MySQL HA architecture and working with Document Store. In the session, we will explore the Document Store with Python.

title: HA capability with Document Store using MySQL Shell - running Python
